title: Scotland: the grand tour
creator_credit: Alex Riva, Lawrence Riva and Scotia International Television
brief_description: Join John Shedden as he narrates a journey around the sights of Scotland. Included on the stop over are: homes of literary figures Robert Burns and Sir Walter Scott, the River Tweed and the popular activities that she offers, St Andrews Golf Course, University of Saint Andrews, the oldest Norman church in Scotland, Earls Hall, Glamis and Blair Castles, battle sights, the Highland Games, Lang Brothers distillery, pubs, Loch Ness, The Trossachs, Pitlochry, Edinburgh, Loch Lomond, Glencoe, Culloden and many more enticements to potential visitors of this lovely country.
